text: Ayub Bachchu (; 16 August 1962 â€“ 18 October 2018) was a Bangladeshi musician, singer-songwriter and Guitarist. He was best known as the founding member of rock band LRB. He was a member of the band Feelings and later he joined the band Souls as lead guitarist. He was one the most influential figures in Bangladeshi rock music. Bachchu died of a heart attack in Dhaka on 18 October 2018 at the age of 56 in Square Hospital of Bangladesh. ==Related pages== *List of Bangladeshi male singers ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from Chittagong Division Category:Bangladeshi singers Category:Bangladeshi writers Category:Guitarists Category:Singer-songwriters Category:Bengali musicians
title: Ayub Bachchu
